document_data.name: Surruk
document_data.mainbody: '''Surruk''' was an [[wild elf|wild elven]] woodsman in [[Phlan]] during the [[Tyranny of Dragons]].
document_data.Possessions: When adventuring, Surruk wore dirty [[leather armor]] and fought with a purple-hued [[Morcant Burl]] [[longbow]]. To protect herself from harm, Surruk usually kept a ''[[healing potion]]'' in her [[backpack]].
document_data.Personality: The [[elf]] was not forthcoming and preferred the wilds of the [[Moonsea]] to speaking with others.
document_data.History: In [[1489 DR]], Surruk patrolled the [[Quivering Forest]] hunting [[fey]] creatures. Later, she went to the [[Madame Freona's Tea Kettle]] and was briefly interrogated by adventurers hired by [[Buhrell Caah]] about a missing dangerous magic item.
